subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: There is a direct line from Germany’s soccer development system, which has been building toward success in the World Cup since 2000, to United States Coach Jurgen Klinsmann.
snippet: There is a direct line from Germany’s soccer development system, which has been building toward success in the World Cup since 2000, to United States Coach Jurgen Klinsmann.
